website_summaries.verdict: The Pantech Link is an absolute steal with an excellent array of midrange features, a great slim design, and a wallet-friendly price. We wish only that it had better call quality.
pros: The Pantech Link is thin and sleek with a rubberized backing and a nice QWERTY keyboard
It has a 1.3-megapixel camera, a music player, 3G/HSDPA, and support for AT&T's new cloud services
cons: The call quality could be improved and the HTML browser seems wasted on such a small screen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap blackberry
customer_reviews.text: Just got this a cheap backup for Blackberry. No trouble getting this up on t-mobile USA. You'll need to create a new "profile" under networks for your apn. For messaging you need to add new profile as well. "under messaging" Mobile Web and most apps wont function without AT&T network. For Internet use "browser" in my stuff->Applications. Says its on 3G but I'm not a speed freak. 3G probably only in some "areas" since t-mobile uses 1700 MHz nationwide for 3G nationwide. Doesn't do blackberry services.
customer_reviews.author: Bobblehead

customer_reviews.title: A high quality QWERTY keyboard phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone deserves 5 stars because it offers a physical QWERTY keyboard, and it is user-friendly. It has lots of nice features, but the learning curve is not steep. I have already customized my Pantech 7040 and I've only had it a week or so. It is not a smartphone, so I save money by not paying for data I don't want or need.
customer_reviews.author: Jot

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: This phone seems like it would be good for texting because of the nice keyboard but the texting application is not very smooth and reliable! It is good for a very light texter or for phone calls only
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for texts.
customer_reviews.text: The Pantech link 7040 is a great looking phone for calls and texting. You dont need a data plan but it has many features. It has a calender to put appointments into, an alarm clock, camera and more. Its a simple phone for people who use it just for texts and calls.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeemom

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone with good features. Its small size is streamlined and easy to carry. The keyboard layout and buttons are small, yet they are not awkward or prone to problems due to big thumbs. Really enjoying this phone.
customer_reviews.author: MMMichele

customer_reviews.title: Looks Fine
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks slim, and fine. Actual use with it texting as dificult and two days after purchase the letter "m" fell off the keypad and was never found. Very frustrated because I specifically bought this phone to text. Disappointed at the "cheap" construction and lettering.
customer_reviews.author: vv

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: my 12 year old daughter loves it. does what she needs and has really good batter life. The camera does tend to take fuzy pictures but nothing is perfect and for a 12 year old it is just right
customer_reviews.author: Tom Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great simple phone
customer_reviews.text: Just makes phone calls. The battery lasts forever. I bought it to use as a business line. I can leave it sit at my desk for several days and it hardly loses any battery. Calls sound good, gets good reception on AT&T. I haven't had an problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, easy to use and built solid
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, easy to use and built solid. Really like the full keypad, as we don't like to text on a numeric pad. Good deal and has lasted better that LG prime that we tried last.
customer_reviews.author: cardoctor

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she did not like it. She used a blackberry for years and when she started using this she didnt like the keyboard. i thought it was a great little cheep phone.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: I have loved this phone from the first time I owned one
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this phone from the first time I owned one! Simple, durable, easy to use, nice QWERTY keyboard. I don't get along well with smart phones - so I went back to this and a tablet, and it's the perfect combo for me! This one arrived quickly, and was exactly as promised!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Biggs-Greenan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: try a could of smart phones and I still like this one better......
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Solid Basic Phone
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as the old one. Still going strong after over a year! Just don't let your cat spill water on it...
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps working
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, still using it today. It connects to the internet when needed and makes and receives calls. No more I could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBusyMom

customer_reviews.title: All good but one thing
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone: good buttons, good call quality, conversation thread for texts, etc. The one bad part is the phone starts to lag if your inbox becomes full. Keep the inbox clean, and you are all set.
customer_reviews.author: Hidden Celtic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone I tend to be hard on touch screens and this is the best for me. I like it for so many reasons, texting is easier and calls are too.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Dutcher

customer_reviews.title: This phone is still strong and a great backup!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my phone, but this little guy's alarm is still sounding! This phone is still strong and a great backup!
customer_reviews.author: ac1987

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this phone and has purchased over 10 times lol
customer_reviews.author: Fluff

customer_reviews.title: Pantech P7040 Link
customer_reviews.text: Solid little phone ...is probably my favorite no-thrills phone of those I've owned..not too useful for internet access though..tiny-tiny screen ..and forget navigating the web. But ...for calls, texting, and easy slip in and out of a back pocket (yes I'm a guy) ...phone is clear with a pretty good speaker phone too.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: good and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought for temporary use and it works well. I would recommend it others if they do not want to spend much money on a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought to replace my wife's phone that got wet. No issues. Just like new. Nice little phone. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Sharp Jr

customer_reviews.title: this is a great solid little phone
customer_reviews.text: this is a great solid little phone. my seller was super helpful and friendly, and the phone is great. 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Not so smart phone
customer_reviews.text: But reliable, cheap and easy...just what I need send and end...easy text...recommended for those who don't want/need anything too fancy.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Crap!
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this item, I thought everything was working okay, until I tried to use the camera. It didnt work. I wanted to put all of my music from my previous phone onto this one, so I purchased a micro SD card. When I attempted to install the Micro SD, I discovered that this is a used phone. The prongs to hold the SD inside the phone are broken like someone shoved something in the Micro SD slot. Because I just discovered this, I am outside of the 30 day return policy and appear to be stuck with this piece of crap. DO NOT order from the same place I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Nice text phone for teenagers!
customer_reviews.text: light weight, and like the feeling of actual keyboard. great for backup phone or phone for teenager who text constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Park

customer_reviews.title: SATIFYED
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE 4 0F THESE. 3 ARE NEW PURCHASED AND 3 ARE OLD. CHOSE THOSE THESE BECAUSE OF SERVICE FROM OLD ONES
customer_reviews.author: robert perkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its awesome! it came earlier than expected! works great no problems so far... :)
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Best phone for a kid
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone for BIG TEXTERS. This is also a good phone for young teens. The Pantech company did it this time, with a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Phone looks great. Fast service. Everything was included in the original package.
customer_reviews.text: The phone was in great shape. The packaging was really good. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Pantech Phone
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME. Cheap and good quality for the price. I'm looking to save money, so it was important that I didn't have a Smart phone because with my phone provider I would be charged another $15 to have a data plan. Right now I just have unlimited internet which functions just like data.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Junk battery.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone off Amazon for my husband. The phone was probably okay, but the battery was junk from the start. It wouldn't hold a charge. Guess I'll think twice about ordering electronics off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mistyn74

customer_reviews.title: It was the right phone for a teenager we purchased it for.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for a teen that does not need to have internet access on their phone. So far no technical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Perry L. Bazonski

customer_reviews.title: She seems to be happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my wife.. She seems to be happy with it...
customer_reviews.author: James Plaisted

customer_reviews.title: waste of your time or wast of your money, you pick.
customer_reviews.text: im using my moms account on here. i ordered this and i expected to get the blue black model that i shouldve been able to take sim card out of my pantech renue and put it into this one so itd work since my renue messed up, i received the orange/black model and not the blue/black. if i had the blue/black model i should or would be able to take sim out of renue and put it in so it would activate and go with plan. but no, i was given the orange black model, which is the gophone version.
customer_reviews.author: Lucretia M.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: They gave me a Fruit & No-Nut Bar instead of give me the phone. You guys shouldn't buy this product and I'm going to return this.
customer_reviews.author: soheil douzandeh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ended up getting the wrong phone. On top of that the wall charger did not work.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE

customer_reviews.title: cell phone
customer_reviews.text: : ))))))))) : )))))))) )))))) ))))))) )))))))))))))) )))))) )))))))))) came on time and works great lijdfwhi oiuruio3r i21r2r 2rour2y8r 2io2uuy4e2 24 8iir2ou4 oi2ruy o`e2uie4u2 2ioio2ueir u2
customer_reviews.author: edward norcross

customer_reviews.title: So far it is working great. Reception and sound are good
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone for my daughter to replace her 2G phone because ATT is deactivating the 2G towers. So far it is working great. Reception and sound are good, and it holds a lot of phone #s. It takes decent pictures. It is sturdy. We are not a "techy"family so this suits her needs. I resent being pushed into paying high monthly bills for a smart phone, as they keep making the "dumb phones" with less features. It's getting hard to find a non-touch, full qwerty "dumb" phone with a camera. Get this one while you still can.
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for calls and texting
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dumbphone for calls and texting, which is what my kids use most. It is very light, has a full keyboard and the battery lasts a long time. For the price, it is a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: The phone itself would have been fine - but we had issues with the battery or ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself would have been fine - but we had issues with the battery or charger not sure - either way, withing a day it wouldn't charge at all - sent it back, no problem with the refund. I even got a new battery - which probably technically wasn't new as in recently made...it still didn't work. I think it had been sitting around too long.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, even after dropping it in a tub of water.
customer_reviews.text: The phone seems to work fine, don't care for the small keys for the numbers. I also dropped the phone in the bath tub, must have vibrated and fell in. It was in the tub for at least an hour. I opened it up, removed the battery, used a can of some air to blow it out, once dried the phone worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: DEF088

customer_reviews.title: It's not a smart phone
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a smart phone. But it's one of the smartest dumb phones I've ever used in my life. It's easy and convenient to use. Still has bloatware and some unprogrammable shortcuts that can mistakenly lead you onto the web if you're not careful. But overall, this phone is simple and get's the job done. If all you need is texting and calling then this phone is PERFECT. Its has a nice calender too, which is always a plus. If you want more than calling and texting, then get a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Solowski

customer_reviews.title: problems with chager
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a school age child as a safety measure. The problem with this phone is that the charger will only work from certain angles. I sent the first one back because of this but didn't bother the second time. The seller was fine; it's just the phone is not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: clw

customer_reviews.title: Reception is really poor compared to other phones I've used
customer_reviews.text: Reception is really poor compared to other phones I've used. The connection time is also very slow and sometime, even outgoing calls cannot connect in an area with full signal strength. My 6 year old ATT phone has perfect connection and no difficulty connecting from my work, where I use my phone most often. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: My New (Old) Phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on the 8th of August, and I was very surprised to find it in my mailbox today on the 12th!! I'm so pleased with it. I had one exactly like this one, but it suffered a tragic fate (it got drowned), and had bought one that I thought was similar to it, but was nothing like it, so I was more than happy to find this one on Amazon! Thanks again!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R. Dowden

customer_reviews.title: This is also a great texting phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the second phone I've had, last one gave in after 3years of service. This is a inexpensive way to have access to some basic multimedia service. This is also a great texting phone.
customer_reviews.author: Flor

customer_reviews.title: my new cell
customer_reviews.text: I have been really happy with this cell phone because it is easy to use. I was able to set up speed dial very quickly and learned it functions with little instructions. The pictures are very nice, I was suprised at the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Phone worked great but t's a dumb phone so could not get ...
customer_reviews.text: Went to Israel and Italy with this phone. Phone worked great but t's a dumb phone so could not get the internet working outside att network.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble finding a phone that is compatible with my cell service and I had hoped this one would work; but it did not, that's the only problem I had, otherwise it was a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my teenage daughter and it works well (it's a phone that can work on AT&T's pay-upfront plans OR regular contract plans which is something even AT&T had to double check). However, she has some complaints with the email features but overall likes the phone. It's not perfect but is still a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: LadySlippers & Loons

customer_reviews.title: Love the LInk
customer_reviews.text: User friendly, technologically sound. I am someone who does not want a Smart Phone. I like the Link because it's compact, the keyboard is easy to use, camera is decent, has speaker phone feature, blue tooth adaptable; I'm totally satisfied. I tried the Alcatel which looks like the Link but it's an inferior phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Curran

customer_reviews.title: Didn't liked the fact that in the information before buying in ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't liked the fact that in the information before buying in it, it didn't say that the cell phone have been wet and suddenly freezes. But otherwise its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Tyana Liz Garcia

customer_reviews.title: 20% chance of getting a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered dozens of these phones. Most work great. 20% don't (bad battery or bad charger). Find out if seller charges for defective returns before you buy one.
customer_reviews.author: MOART

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: this phone is indestructible!! it will not break! recommended for kids or other people who are constantly breaking their phones!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Greatreplacement for an old style phone. Worth the $15 to have the ringer/alarm work again
customer_reviews.author: liz uppleger

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone, ordered because of the extended battery life. Seriously, this phone can stay on for close to a week without a charge. Love it. I also like the buttons, as I am a fumble fingers on my iPad with numbers.
customer_reviews.author: V. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone to replace one that my son left outside in the rain. He is no longer using it at the moment but...It worked great while he was using it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything as expected. It is what it says it is. Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.author: LAURENCE PURVIS

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use this phone
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use phone !!!, Easy to change between my old phone to this one, it works great with my old SIM card and did not need to go in or call AT&T to make the change.
customer_reviews.author: BILLIE

customer_reviews.title: Pantech Link P7040 Phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone especially for texting. It is great and locks automatically when I am done using it, which I like. There was a problem with the battery wearing down very quickly - I had to charge it very other day. I wrote to m&mWorks from whom I purchased it through Amazon and they sent me another one free of charge and didn't require me to return the battery I had. I really appreciated them doing that for me. All in all, it's been a great phone. I only use it for calls and text at this time - not email. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne H. Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: This phone has an excellent design, although it suffers from terrible viewing angles for the display. This phone works well and has a useable interface. It is definitely not a Blackberry but for the price there is nothing better. Typing in phone numbers can be a bit a little difficult with the qwerty keyboard. All a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for a non smart phone
customer_reviews.text: worth it for the price. works good but is just not intuitive to get around in the menus. internet connection is slow
customer_reviews.author: TN Worm

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife who didn't want all the expense of paying for internet data on an I-phone. But, she did want something that would make texting a lot easier. This phone fit the bill perfectly. Sound on it is great, even on the speakerphone. It doesn't drop calls, and the battery seems to last a long time. Texting is a breeze and it seems to be laid out very logically. My wife loves it! She says it's just the right size....not too heavy or bulky. I'd recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: RWB

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked great right out of the box with my sim card. I love it. I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Coffman

customer_reviews.title: keys are orange not blue like the picture
customer_reviews.text: keys are orange not blue like the picture, other than that the phone works okay for my needs, talking and texting
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: scam! not unlocked!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it claimedto be unlocked. that is not the case. unless you want a plan with at&t DO NOT PURCHASE this.
customer_reviews.author: mom the maven

customer_reviews.title: good service too
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she loves it, good service too.
customer_reviews.author: Book reader 2

product_meta.title: Pantech Link P7040 Unlocked GSM 3G Cell Phone w/ 1.3MP Camera + Video
product_meta.description: The Pantech Link P7040 is a thin and light messaging phone with a full QWERTY keyboard, email, instant messaging, and MMS and SMS messaging capabilities. The Link is a 3G phone with HSDPA data, 1 megapixel camera, music player, stereo Bluetooth compatibility, video sharing, and a microSD slot. This phone also supports GPS navigation, and comes equipped with quad-band GSM and WCDMA modes for international use.
feature_bullets: GPS with A-GPS support, AT&T Navigator

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
